pid,

mapper.update:
update p_production
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update p_production set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
